about.title: How Balbi Giardini was born
about.story: My name is Giuseppe Balbi and my passion for green comes from far away. Since childhood, I accompanied my father in agricultural work on family lands, where we cultivated vegetable gardens, vines, olive trees and numerous fruit trees. It was there that I learned the value of care, patience and respect for nature. At twenty years old, I decided to transform that passion into a profession, starting my independent activity, which I carried on with dedication for over thirty years. In recent years, Andrea Boatto joined me, a talented and motivated young professional, who shares my same values and has helped make this pre-retirement period even more stimulating. In August 2025, I officially entered retirement, but the company's story didn't stop: my daughter Greta chose to take up the torch and guide the activity towards a new phase, transforming it into Balbi Giardini Sagl.
about.quote: The spirit remains the same. Andrea will continue to take care of your gardens with professionalism and attention, while Giuseppe will remain present as the first contact.
